name: Professional Home Inspection
tagline: Comprehensive home inspection with detailed report, thermal imaging, and pest inspection. Same-day scheduling available.
reviewHighlight: Very thorough inspection, found issues we never would have noticed. Report was detailed and easy to understand.

packages.name: Basic Inspection
packages.description: Visual inspection of major systems including structure, roof, HVAC, plumbing, and electrical. Includes detailed photo report.

packages.name: Premium Inspection
packages.description: Everything in Basic plus thermal imaging, radon testing, and pest inspection. Priority scheduling within 24 hours.

packages.name: Platinum Inspection
packages.description: Complete Premium package plus pool/spa inspection, septic system evaluation, and well water testing. Same-day service guaranteed.

faq.question: How long does a typical inspection take?
faq.answer: A standard home inspection takes 2-4 hours depending on the size and age of the property. We'll provide you with an estimated timeframe when you book.

faq.question: When will I receive the inspection report?
faq.answer: You'll receive a comprehensive digital report within 24 hours of the inspection. The report includes photos, descriptions of issues found, and recommendations for repairs.

faq.question: Can I attend the inspection?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We encourage buyers to attend so we can walk you through our findings and answer questions in real-time.

faq.question: What's included in the thermal imaging?
faq.answer: Thermal imaging helps identify moisture intrusion, insulation gaps, electrical hot spots, and HVAC efficiency issues that aren't visible to the naked eye.

compliance.disclaimer: This inspection service is provided by an independent third-party vendor. Pricing and availability subject to vendor terms.

name: Title Insurance & Escrow
tagline: Comprehensive title search and insurance with digital closing. Fast processing, competitive rates, and nationwide coverage.
reviewHighlight: Smooth closing process with excellent communication. Digital signing made everything so convenient.

packages.name: Owner's Policy
packages.description: Standard owner's title insurance policy protecting your ownership rights. One-time premium paid at closing.

packages.name: Lender's Policy
packages.description: Required by most lenders to protect their investment. Premium based on loan amount.

packages.name: Complete Protection Bundle
packages.description: Both Owner's and Lender's policies bundled for maximum savings. Includes enhanced coverage and digital escrow management.

faq.question: What does title insurance protect against?
faq.answer: Title insurance protects against ownership disputes, unpaid liens, errors in public records, fraud, forgery, and undisclosed heirs that could affect your property ownership.

faq.question: How long does the title search take?
faq.answer: Most title searches are completed within 3-5 business days. We'll notify you immediately if any issues are discovered that need resolution.

faq.question: Do I really need both owner's and lender's policies?
faq.answer: Lender's policy is typically required by your mortgage company. Owner's policy is optional but highly recommended to protect your investment for as long as you own the property.

faq.question: Can I do digital closing?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer fully digital closing with e-signatures for most transactions. We can also arrange mobile notary or in-office closing if preferred.

faq.question: What if issues are found during the title search?
faq.answer: We work to resolve title defects before closing. Most issues like unpaid taxes or liens can be cleared, but we'll keep you informed throughout the process.

compliance.respa: This is a settlement service. Prices quoted are estimates and may vary based on property value and location.
compliance.disclaimer: Title insurance rates are regulated by state insurance departments. Final rates may vary by state.
